Name: Acid
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce Sp. Defense of those affected.
Description: The Pokemon showers its foes with a corrosive acid, the burning sensation may leave an opening for other attacks.

Name: After You
Effect: The Target will go first in the order of Initiative. Lasts for the rest of this Battle.
Description: The user bows and courteously lets an ally or foe use their action first.

Name: Agility
Effect: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2.
Description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster.

Name: Ally Switch
Effect: User switches back. Choose another Pokemon to take its place. It will be ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.
Description: The user teleports, switching its place with someone.

Name: Acid Armor
Effect: Increase the User's Defense by 2.
Description: A liquid acid substance seeps through this Pokemon's body turning it into a liquid-like state. The acid deters foes from touching this Pokemon at full force.

Name: Acid Spray
Effect: Reduce the foe's Special by 2.
Description: The user spits a corrosive substance, the burning sensation doesn't allow it to focus on attacking.

Name: Apple Acid
Effect: Reduce the Foe's Sp. Defense.
Description: The Pokemon produces a sap from the tart apples it feeds on, if the apples, this sap is acidic and bad for your teeth.

Name: Aerial Ace
Effect: Never Fail.
Description: The Pokemon rises up in the air towards a light source, momentarily blinding the foe, then plummets quickly to attack the opponent.

Name: Acrobatics
Effect: If the User has a Held Item, remove 2 Dice from the Damage Roll.
Description: The user makes quick and graceful acrobatic moves to hit the foe, it will be swifter if nothing gets in the way.

Name: Acupressure
Effect: Increase a Random Attribute. If this Move is used again, the previous Attribute Modifier is removed.
Description: The user starts pushing its pressure points, releasing the energy that was stored in its body.

Name: Air Cutter
Effect: Target all foes in Range. High Critical.
Description: The user will send out a wave of sharp wind that will harm anything it touches.

Name: Accelerock
Effect: Priority 1.
Description: The Pokemon dashes at great speed using the rocks on its body to strike its foe upon impact.

Name: Amnesia
Effect: Increase the User's Sp. Defense by 2.
Description: As a fine example of mind over matter, the user temporarily empties its mind to make it more resilient.

Name: Any Move
Effect: This move represents every possible move. Metronome but better.

Name: Anchor Shot
Effect: Ranged. Blocks.
Description: The Pokemon hurls an anchor towards its foe and entangles it with seaweed, the anchor drags the foe down so it cannot escape.

Name: Aromatherapy
Effect: Cure User and Allies from Burn, Freeze, Paralysis, Poison, or Sleep.
Description: The Pokemon releases medicinal scents and vapors to refresh the user and its allies.

Name: Arm Thrust
Effect: Successive Actions.
Description: The user quickly throws blows of open-palmed thrusts against the foe.

Name: Aqua Jet
Effect: Priority 1.
Description: The user propels itself with a blast of water and strikes at high speed.

Name: Air Slash
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
Description: The user will surround the foe with razor-like wind that may knock it down.

Name: Aqua Ring
Effect: If successful spent 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, recover 1 HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The user coats itself in a ring of special flowing water that lessens the pain.

Name: Aeroblast
Effect: Lethal. High Critical.
Description: The victim is trapped in a violently swirling vortex. The strong wind currents make debris fly everywhere.

Name: Ancient Power
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense, and Sp. Defense.
Description: the Pokemon calls upon an energy fron ancient times that strikes the foe and may infuse the user with a primal strength.

Name: Aqua Tail
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user swings its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Name: Aromatic Mist
Effect: Increase one Ally's Defense and Sp. Defense.
Description: The Pokemon showers an ally in a mist with a revitalizing armoa.

Name: Absorb
Effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt rounded down.
Description: The user absorbs the vital energy of the foe.

Name: Assist
Effect: Choose one Move known by a random member of your party. You performed that Move using the Accuracy roll from Assist.
Description: The Pokemon hurriedly remembers one action performed by a partner. Some Pokemon can even do what a human does and assist him with any tasks.

Name: Attack Order
Effect: High Critical. Ranged.
Description: The user calls upon her swarm and heeds them to charge against you. No matter where you run, they will surround you. Hope you are not allergic to bees.

Name: Assurance
Effect: If the User has already received damage from the target this Round add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The user retaliates against the foe, the rush of adrenaline allows it to hit harder.

Name: Aura Wheel
Effect: If successful, Increase user's Dexterity. If the user is in “Hangry” Form this Move is considered to be Dark-Type.
Description: The Pokemon happily runs into a wheel made of electricity that strikes the foe. If the user is feeling hungry the wheel's energy is replaced by a dark aura.

Name: Astonish
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
Description: The user sneaks close and startles the foe.

Name: Aura Sphere
Effect: Never Fail.
Description: The user channels its aura and launches this power in the form of a sphere The foe's aura is hit, leaving the target unscratched but deeply hurt.

Name: Autotomize
Effect: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2. User's weight is halved for the rest of Scene.
Description: The Pokemon sheds pieces and starts rotating other parts of its body for easier and lighter movement.

Name: Aurora Beam
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength.
Description: The Pokemon shoots a beautiful rainbow colored beam that may leave the foe flabbergasted.

Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Effect: Priority 1. Reduce foe's Strength.
Description: Before anyone acts in battle, the user looks at the foe with the cutest eyes.

Name: Baton Pass
Effect: Switcher Move. User switches out with another Pokemon. Any Attribute increase on the user is passed on the next Pokemon. The user can’t increase its Attributes again until the end of the scene.
Description: The user stores part of its power on a twig or a stick, anyone who touch the item will receive its might.

Name: Aurora Veil
Effect: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from both Physical and Special Attacks. This move will fail if not performed under Hail Weather. Lasts until Hail Weather is over.
Description: Aurora lights and hail spin around the Pokemon and its Allies, deflecting attacks.

Name: Attract
Effect: If Successful, Target is now In Love. This Move fails if target is from same gender as the User or genderless.
Description: The user makes use of its good looks and attitude to infatuate its foe.

Name: Baneful Bunker
Effect: Priority 4. Shield. If the foe attacked using a Physical Move, it is now Poisoned. Reduce 3 Dice from the Foe's Damage Pool.
Description: The user encloses itself inside its sturdy shell, which is covered by poisonous barbs. If a barb pinches the foe's skin the wound will start to fester.

Name: Avalanche
Effect: Low Priority 4. If the user received damage from the target this Round, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The user builds up a lot of snow around itself. If anything disturbs the snow, it will fall on the attacker like an avalanche.

Name: Baddy Bad
Effect: If successful, for the next 4 Rounds the User and Allies will receive 1 less damage from Physical Attacks. This effect does not stack. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
Description: The Pokemon acts like a thug and channels its own dark aura as protection for itself and its allies.

Name: Barrage
Effect: Ranged. Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon Throws many round objects at the target, one after the other.

Name: Behemoth Bash
Effect: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokemon becomes a giant energy shield that tramples everything in its wake. If the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all its energy will be swept away.

Name: Behemoth Blade
Effect: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokemon becomes a giant sword with a razor-sharp blade. If the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all its energy will be slashed to bits.

Name: Belch
Effect: The user must eat something before using this Move. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user lets out a horrible belch on the target. The air contains toxins that deal a terrible damage.

Name: Barrier
Effect: Increase the User's Defense by 2.
Description: The user casts a protective field around itself.

Name: Beat Up
Effect: If the attack is successful, add 2 Dice of Damage for every ally Pokemon that spends an action to help the user perform this move. Up to 3 allies may join.
Description: The user calls other Pokemon to aid it in battle, together they give a beating to the foe.

Name: Beak Blast
Effect: Ranged. Charge Move. Low Priority 3. If the User is hit by a Non Ranged Physical Attack while this move is charging, apply Burn 2 to the foe.
Description: The Pokemon gets ready to release a boiling gas through its beak, which gets incredibly hot. The resulting blast sounds like a train's horn.

Name: Bestow
Effect: If target is not holding an Item, the User gives its own.
Description: The Pokemon respectfully offers an item, the target will take it and keep it to be polite.

Name: Belly Drum
Effect: User deals Damage to itself equal to Half of its total HP rounded down. Increase User's Strength by 3.
Description: The Pokemon Roars a war cry while hitting its Belly.

Name: Bide
Effect: The User will take the next 2 hits. After those two attacks, you may use this Move again to retaliate with Strength + Twice the Damage Received from those 2 hits.
Description: The user endures the hit then unleashes an attack even greater.

Name: Bind
Effect: Block. Deal 2 dice of damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon uses its body to bind the foe, restraining and squeezing it.

Name: Blaze Kick
Effect: High Critical. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the Foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user throws a mighty kick engulfed in fire that may leave a bad looking burn.

Name: Block
Effect: Blocks.
Description: The user moves swiftly, blocking the escape routes of the foe.

Name: Bite
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
Description: The user lands a vicious bite that may leave an ugly bruise.

Name: Blast Burn
Effect: Lethal. Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon uses all of its power to deliver an infernal blast to the foe. The user is left exhausted.

Name: Bone Club
Effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user hits the target with a bone, the smack may leave a bump on the target's head.

Name: Bone Rush
Effect: Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user quickly strikes the foe with a bone, one blow after another.

Name: Blizzard
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected. If performed under Hail Weather Ignore this moves Reduced Accuracy and the Move can't be evaded. If performed under Sunny Weather Accuracy becomes -3 instead. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user swirls a violent gelid wind around the foes. This blizzard may not last long, but it is tremendously strong.

Name: Bonemerang
Effect: Ranged. Double Action. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon throws a bone to hit the foe. The bone returns like a boomerang, striking a second time.

Name: Body Press
Description: The Pokemon makes a judo maneuver, using its body mass instead of its strength against the target.

Name: Bolt Beak
Effect: If the Target hasn't had a Turn this Round, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool.
Description: The Pokemon charges with its beak and pecks its foe, if the foe is not fast it will be zapped by a jolt of electricity.

Name: Bounce
Effect: Charge Move. While charging this Move, the user will be out of range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
Description: The Pokemon will jump 30 feet in the air before landing on top of the foe. The user won't suffer any falling damage.

Name: Body Slam
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
Description: The user charges against the foe using its body to knock it down, leaving the target stunned.

Name: Branch Poke
Description: The Pokemon rudely starts poking its foe with a stick.

Name: Boomburst
Effect: Sound Based.
Description: The user creates an explosive sound that deafens everyone in the battlefield.

Name: Blue Flare
Effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the foe. -2 Accuracy.
Description: Reshiram surrounds itself with a giant blue flame that is unleashed with an earth shattering explosion. Receiving this attack directly might completely engulf you in fire.

Name: Brave Bird
Effect: Recoil.
Description: The Pokemon flies straight at the foe at full speed, the collision might hurt both of them.

Name: Bouncy Bubble
Effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
Description: The user shoots bubbles at its target, the bubbles fill up with fresh water upon contact and bounce back towards the user. Should you drink the water inside? Who cares? It's fun!

Name: Brick Break
Effect: If a Barrier is in place on the foe's side (ie. Light Screen, Reflect) destroy the barrier and add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokemon uses its palm or claws to perform a one-armed chop that shatters even invisible barriers.

Name: Bolt Strike
Effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. -2 Accuracy.
Description: Zekrom delivers a powerful tackle while discharging lightning through its body. The foe is rendered unable to move, either by the strike or the electricity

Name: Breaking Swipe
Effect: All Foes in Range. Reduce the Strength of those affected.
Description: The Pokemon will use its tail to make a long swipe at its foes. A few cracks are heard, and the foe will limp afterwards.

Name: Brutal Swing
Effect: Lethal. Target all Foes in range.
Description: The Pokemon starts attacking at full force with its claws, anyone unfortunate enough to be in its path will end up severely wounded.

Name: Brine
Effect: If the foe is at half HP or less, add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The user blasts the foe with extremely dense water, if the target is tired he may be swept away easily by the pressure.

Name: Bubble Beam
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Dexterity.
Description: A long stream of bubbles hits the foe, the bubble foam may prevent the target from moving freely.

Name: Bug Buzz
Effect: Sound Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to reduce foe's Sp. Defense.
Description: The Pokemon uses its wings or part of its body to emit sound waves that harm and affect the target.

Name: Bug Bite
Effect: If the Target Pokemon is holding a berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
Description: The Pokemon nibbles its foe, if it finds something tasty it will eat it in an instant. It may try to eat almost anything.

Name: Bubble
Effect: Target all foes in range. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.
Description: A spray of bubbles flies around the enemies, some of the bubbles stick to their bodies hindering their movement.

Name: Bullet Punch
Effect: Fist Based. Priority 1.
Description: The user launches itself against the foe to strike it with an iron fist.

Name: Charm
Effect: Reduce foe's Strength by 2.
Description: The Pokemon uses a cute and harmless attitude to make the foe less wary and aggresive.

Name: Buzzy Buzz
Effect: Paralyze the foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
Description: The Pokemon releases a jolt of static electricity from its fur, that makes a cute zapping sound. It's all fun and games until somebody gets paralyzed.

Name: Bullet Seed
Effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.
Description: The Pokemon shoots seeds rapidly as if they were bullets.

Name: Captivate
Effect: If the affected targets are from the opposite gender, Reduce their Special by 2.
Description: The Pokemon shows off its attractiveness and even flirts with the opponents, those who fall for its charms can’t focus on the battle.

Name: Calm Mind
Effect: Increase the User's Special and Sp. Defense.
Description: The user quietly calms its spirit to strengthen its mind and body.

Name: Chip Away
Effect: This attack ignores Defense and Evasion modifiers on the foe.
Description: The user looks for an opening and strikes directly there. It nibbles bit by bit even the toughest of surfaces.

Name: Camouflage
Effect: For the rest of the scene the User changes type to one that fits the terrain it is in (i.e. Usar is in a rocky cave, becoming rock type)
Description: The user mimics the environment, it becomes one with the surroundings.

Name: Charge
Effect: Add 2 Dice to the Damage Pool to the next Electric Damaging move the user performs.
Description: The user concentrates all the electricity in its body to be released.

Name: Circle Throw
Effect: Low Priority 1. The target is hit and knocked back to its trainer forcing them to send out another Pokemon. In the wild the target is sent away. Switcher Move. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user throws the target 60 feet out of the battlefield.

Name: Chatter
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Sound based move.
Description: The user starts talking and giving orders in human language. It may be extremely confusing for the foes.

Name: Clangorous Soul
Effect: User deals Damage to itself equal to Half of its total HP rounded down. Increase User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense.
Description: The Pokemon shakes its scales around, to sharpen, shed, and rearrange them. It's a bit rough, but in the end the Pokemon feels more focused for battle.

Name: Burn Up
Effect: Lethal. After Damage is dealt, the user is no longer considered a Fire-Type for the rest of the day (if its only type was Fire, it is now considered Typeless). Fire-type Moves won't add their Power to the Damage pool of this Pokemon for the rest of the day.
Description: The User unleashes all of its might through a massive blast of raging fire. Although the damage is devastating the Pokemon is left unable to produce more fire for at least a day.

Name: Clamp
Effect: Block. Deal 2 Dice of Damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user traps and crushes the opponent using its thick and sturdy shell.

Name: Close Combat
Effect: After dealing damage, Reduce the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.
Description: The user attacks at a close distance to deal lots of damage. The foe is also close enough to attack.

Name: Clanging Scales
Effect: Sound Based. Reduce User's Defense.
Description: The Pokemon rattles the scales of its armor creating a frightening noise in the area. Some of its scales fall of as a result, leaving some areas exposed.

Name: Clear Smog
Effect: Never Fail. Reset all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits of the foe.
Description: The user sucks all gases to clear away all impurities. The target is left heeling hurt, but light headed.

Name: Comet Punch
Effect: Successive Actions. Fist Based.
Description: The user throws a quick series of punches at the foe.

Name: Coil
Effect: Increase the User's Strength, Defense, and Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon curls up its body. In a calm but menacing position it prepares to deliver its strike.

Name: Bulldoze
Effect: Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.
Description: The user stomps and tramples the place, breaking stones, trees, and everything nearby.

Name: Bulk Up
Effect: Increase the User's Strength and Defense.
Description: The Pokemon shows its muscles with intimidating poses to look bigger and stronger.

Name: Charge Beam
Effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Special. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon lets out an electric beam then uses the remaining charge to boost its power.

Name: Constrict
Effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The Pokemon uses its body to hold and constrict the foe. It won't let go easily.

Name: Confusion
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
Description: The target's mind is hit by a weak psychic force that leaves them wondering if they were hit by an invisible enemy. Sometimes the foe is left seeing things that aren't really there.

Name: Confide
Effect: Reduce the foes' Special.
Description: The Pokemon tells a secret to the target. The foe loses its ability to concentrate.

Name: Conversion 2
Effect: After being dealt damage, choose a Type resistant to the Type of that attack. That's the Type of the User until it uses this Move again.
Description: The Pokemon downloads the data of a move that was used against it. Change the code of the user to a type resistant to the that move.

Name: Copycat
Effect: Copies the last move the foe has performed.
Description: The user will closely watch the movements of the target and will imitate them to perfection.

Name: Cotton Guard
Effect: Increase the User's Defense by 3.
Description: The user covers itself in cotton puffs that severely reduce the impact of physical attacks.

Name: Crabhammer
Effect: High Critical. -1 Accuracy.
Description: A large pincer strikes with the power of a hammer. The demolition power is incredible.

Name: Counter
Effect: This Move can only deal damage if the Foe has dealt Physical Damage to the User this Round. Roll the same Damage Pool as your Foe plus 2 Extra Dice. Ignore the foe's Defenses.
Description: The user prepares to receive damage, then returns the same damage and more.

Name: Cosmic Power
Effect: Increase the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.
Description: The user absorbs power from space. This Pokemon glows faintly with energy afterwards.

Name: Covet
Effect: If the user is not holding an item, Steal the target's Held Item.
Description: The User approaches with caution, deals a quick strike and takes the chance to steal the target's item.

Name: Core Enforcer
Effect: If successful and the target of this Move has already inflicted damage this Round, remove the Foe's Ability for the rest of the Scene. (Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Stance Change & Shields Down are exceptions)
Description: Zygarde shoots a beam that fractures the target to its core, rendering it unable to sustain even the most basic of its traits.

Name: Conversion
Effect: The user changes its type at random.
Description: The Pokemon downloads the data of a Move to add it to its code.

Name: Cotton Spore
Effect: Reduce foe's Dexterity by 2.
Description: The Pokemon covers the foe in cotton, disrupting its movement speed.

Name: Crafty Shield
Effect: Priority 3. The User and its Allies are protected from the effects of a Support Move. Shield.
Description: The Pokemon creates a magic shield to protect everyone from the bad tricks a foe might have under its sleeve. Under this shield, everyone can see dishonesty and bad intentions.

Name: Cross Poison
Effect: High Critical. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.
Description: The Pokemon drenches poison into its pincers to slash the enemy in a brutal way.

Name: Cover An Ally
Effect: The user will provide cover to the target from Ranged attacks and is more likely to be hit by close-range attacks. The level of Cover the user provides will depend on its size.

Name: Court Change
Effect: Swap any Barriers (i.e.Light Screen, Reflect etc.), Entry Hazards (i.e. Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web etc.) and Effects on the foe's side of the field (i.e. Tailwind, Grassy Terrain etc.) for the one's on the User's side.
Description: The Pokemon signals the referee for half-time, the referee complies and both parties swap their sides of the field. Wait. Did we forget something?

Name: Cross Chop
Effect: High Critical. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user delivers a chop with its arms crossed trying to hot a weak spot.

Name: Confuse Ray
Effect: Confuse the foe.
Description: The user flashes a sinister ray of bright light that leaves the target disoriented and confused.

Name: Crunch
Effect: Lethal. Roll 1 Chance Dice to reduce foe's Defense.
Description: The Pokemon uses its fangs to viciously tear whatever it is biting.

Name: Crush Grip
Effect: Lethal. If the foe has a Base HP higher than 3, add 1 Die to the Damage pool for every exceeding point. Up to 9 Dice may be added this way
Description: The Pokemon grips the foe and starts crushing it. Small targets are difficult to grasp but larger bodies will not be released until they break.

Name: Crush Claw
Effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the target's Defense by 2. Lethal.
Description: The user crushes its claws against the foe, it may pierce the skin of the foe.

Name: Curse (Non-Ghost User)
Effect: Increase the User's Strength and Defense. Reduce the User's Dexterity. This effect is only for Pokemon who are not Ghost-Type.
Description: The Pokemon prepares to deal and receive damage by muttering something not appropriate for kids.

Name: Curse
Effect: Roll half the user's HP as damage dice to itself, ignoring Defenses. The target will remove 1 success from all their rolls until the Curse is lifted.
Description: The user mutters words that become an evil incantation, the curse may only be lifted by a medium or through divine intervention.

Name: Cut
Effect: May be used to cut down trees and clear paths.
Description: A slim but precise cut that may slice through anything.

Name: Dark Void
Effect: All Foes in Range have the Sleep condition.  -3 Accuracy.
Description: A portal opens and transports all foes to a world of darkness, inside they can't see or feel anything, it's like they are trapped in an eternal slumber.

Name: Dark Pulse
Effect: Targets random foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
Description: The Pokemon sends a wave of dark feelings that affect those who are most vulnerable, hurting the foe and leaving it unable to act.

Name: Dazzling Gleam
Description: The user shines a powerful flash that hurts the eyes of everyone watching it.

Name: Darkest Lariat
Effect: Ignore the the foe's Attribute Increases that would decrease this Move's damage.
Description: The user swings both of its arms against the target, there's no armor thick enough to stop the strike.

Name: Decorate
Effect: Increase the Strength and Special of One Ally by 2
Description: Using some frosting the Pokemon decorates their target to look bigger, more powerful, and incredibly delicious!

Name: Defend Order
Effect: User Increases its Defense and Sp. Defense.
Description: A swarm of bugs flies around the user, creating a barrier to protect this Pokemon from damage.

Name: Disarming Voice
Effect: Sound Based. Never Fail. Targets All foes in range.
Description: With a charming and manipulative cry, the user deals emotional damage to its opponent. This move always makes the target feel bad.

Name: Diamond Storm
Effect: Ranged. Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Defense by 2.
Description: The Pokemon summons a storm of diamonds over the field, these diamonds also serve as barriers the user can take cover into.

Name: Destiny Bond
Effect: If the user faints this Round due to Combat damage, the Pokemon that dealt the damage will faint at the same time.
Description: The Pokemon creates a mystical bond with anyone that causes it harm. Whatever ill falls on the user, it falls on the perpetrator too.

Name: Dizzy Punch
Effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Fist Based.
Description: A swift punch to the jaw that spins the target and may leave it quite dizzy and disoriented.

Name: Detect
Effect: Priority. Shield Move. Reduce 3 Damage this pokemon would receive from a Damaging Move. Negate effects of Support Moves that target the user. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the user would take.
Description: The user detects the intentions of the attacker and acts out to minimize the damage.

Name: Disable
Effect: The Target cannot use the last move it performed. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The user hits a nerve on the foe, impeding it from performing its previous action for a short while.

Name: Discharge
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze those affected.
Description: The user releases its stored electricity in all directions.

Name: Dive
Effect: Charge Move. While charging this move, the User will be out of range. Allows the Pokemon to swim into Deep Waters.
Description: The user submerges into the water and continues diving at an insane speed.

Name: Dig
Effect: Charge Move. While charging this move, the User will be out of range. Can be hit by Earthquake, Magnitude, or a similar move.
Description: The user digs a tunnel on the ground and attacks while coming out from below.

Name: Double Hit
Effect: Double Action. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon uses the classic 'One-Two' to attack the foe.

Name: Doom Desire
Effect: Strikes at the end of the Round after the next. Bypass Shield Moves and Cover. If the target retires or switches out from battle, the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies. Extra effects may be added at Storyteller's Discretion
Description: Be careful what you wish for, this Pokemon will read your most intimate wishes and make them come true in very twisted ways.

Name: Double-Edge
Effect: Recoil.
Description: The user recklessly slams its foe to deal a lot of damage, but it may also hurt itself in the process.

Name: Double Team
Effect: The User can now make up to 5 Evasions per Round.
Description: The user moves rapidly around the foe, creating illusory copies of itself.

Name: Double Kick
Effect: Double Action.
Description: The user throws two powerful kicks.

Name: Double Slap
Effect: Successive Actions. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user attacks its foe with two or more slaps in the face.

Name: Double Iron Bash
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
Description: The user hardens its limbs and then rotates them at great speed to hit the foe twice in a row. The blow can leave the victim crushed on the floor.

Name: Dragon Breath
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
Description: The user lets out a mystical green breath that hinders the movement of anyone it touches.

Name: Defog
Effect: Remove all Barriers (ie. Light Screen, Reflect), Entry Hazards (Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, etc.), and Terrains (Misty Terrain, Electric Terrain, etc.) from the battlefield.
Description: A strong current of wind that blows away any fog and even invisible barriers.

Name: Dragon Claw
Description: The Pokemon uses its strong claws to deliver a fierce tearing blow.

Name: Dragon Darts
Effect: Ranged. Double Action
Description: The Pokemon's head is a nest for its less evolved forms, the younglings will sometimes be used as projectiles.

Name: Dragon Ascent
Effect: Lethal. Reduce the user's Defense and Sp. Defense.
Description: The user rises above the clouds and then comes crashing down against its foe in an instant. The strike is brutal for both.

Name: Defense Curl
Effect: Increase the User's Defense.
Description: The user curls like a ball to protect against most threats.

Name: Dragon Dance
Effect: Increase the User's Strength and Dexterity.
Description: The user performs a vigorous and mystical dance that boosts the fighting spirit and reflexes.

Name: Draco Meteor
Effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon calls a comet that falls from the sky to deal a brutal amount of damage. This feat demands a lot from the user.

Name: Dragon Pulse
Description: The user opens its mouth and sends a powerful wave of energy.

Name: Dragon Rage
Effect: This moves always inflicts 2 damage.
Description: A dual colored flame that always leaves the same burn marks on everything it touches.

Name: Drill Run
Effect: High Critical.
Description: The user rotates its body imitating a drill and crashes against the foe. This attack may pierce through walls and floors with ease and great precision.

Name: Dragon Hammer
Description: The Pokemon swings its body as a hammer and leaves the foe nailed to the cracked ground.

Name: Draining Kiss
Effect: The User restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
Description: The user sends a kiss with a flirty intention, the foe catches the kiss but it ends up draining the target's energy.

Name: Drain Punch
Effect: Fist Based. The user restore HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a powerful punch. Through contact, it absorbs some vital energy.

Name: Dragon Rush
Effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user charges rapidly against the foe. The strike may leave thetarget gasping for air.

Name: Dragon Tail
Effect: Low Priority 1. The target is hit and knocked back to its trainer, stunned. Forcing the trainer to send another Pokemon. In the wild the target is sent away. Switcher Move. -1 Accuracy.
Description: This Powerful tail strike can knockdown anyone up to 100 feet away!

Name: Dream Eater
Effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down. The target must be asleep, this move will fail otherwise.
Description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. When the foe wakes up, it will feel weak and empty.

Name: Drill Peck
Description: The user pierces the foe with its beak used as a drill. A dangerous move.

Name: Drum Beating
Effect: Reduce the Foe's Dexterity
Description: The Pokemon has a perfectly good drum and you'd think it would use it. But it doesn't. It uses it's foe.

Name: Dual Chop
Effect: Double Action. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon strikes the foe with brutal blows.

Name: Dynamax Cannon
Effect: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokemon shoots a heavy projectile, if the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all the energy will be concentrated and explode on the target.

Name: Dynamic Punch
Effect: Fist Based. Confuse the foe. -3 Accuracy.
Description: A punch that hits a small pressure point. It leavers the foe disoriented.

Name: Earthquake
Effect: Area Attack. Ranged.
Description: The Pokemon focuses its energy into shaking the ground, everyone around will be thrown like a rag doll.

Name: Earth Power
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.
Description: The user sends out a subterranean wave that bursts on the ground bellow the target. It looks like the earth molds to the Pokemon's will.

Name: Egg Bomb
Effect: Ranged. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user throws a big egg with great force against its foe.

Name: Eerie Impulse
Effect: Reduce foe's Special by 2.
Description: The user radiates electricity around itself, the foe will think twice about attacking.

Name: Embargo
Effect: The target cannot use its held item nor can its trainer use items on it.
Description: The user quickly takes out the held item of a Pokemon. It also empties the bag of the trainer and forces everyone to stay away from their own properties. Evildoers master this Move.

Name: Electric Terrain
Effect: For the Next 4 Rounds all Electric Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. Anyone on the ground will be cured from "Sleep" Status.
Description: The user electrifies the terrain, making it impossible to get a good night's sleep on it.

Name: Ember
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.
Description: The user shoots a small flame against the target that may cause a first-degree burn.

Name: Electro Ball
Effect: The user adds 1 Dice to the Damage Pool for every Dexterity point the User has that surpasses the foe's. Up to 4 Dice may be added.
Description: The Pokemon creates a small electricity orb that is hurled at the target. If the user is faster, the impact will be bigger.

Name: Endeavor
Effect: Roll Damage equal to the Difference between user's Full HP and its Current HP (up to 10). User cannot reduce the target's HP to lower than its own remaining HP. Ignore foe's Defenses.
Description: With pure willpower, the user struggles with its foe despite the pain

Name: Electroweb
Effect: Reduce Dexterity of those affected.
Description: Shoots an electrified web at all foes to restrict their movement. Walking through this web can be painful.

Name: Encore
Effect: For the duration of this effect, the target will repeat the exact same action sequence it had this round. Target must have had an action sequence. Last 4 Rounds. Priority 3.
Description: The user claps and cheers at the target to encourage it to repeat what it just did.

Name: Electrify
Effect: The Damage from the next attack made by the target will be Electric Type.
Description: The user hurls an electric projectile to the target, the foe is charged with electricity until it is released by the foe's next attack.

Name: Extreme Speed
Effect: Priority 2. Triple the Pokemon's movement speed.
Description: The user charges at a blinding speed against the target.

Name: Energy Ball
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.
Description: The Pokemon gathers nature's energy in a ball and hurls it at the foe. Trees and bushes may be left opaque and sad.

Name: Eternabeam
Effect: Lethal. Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon shoots an incredibly powerful beam towards the sky. The energy released might keep traveling through space thousands of years later.

Name: Echoed Voice
Effect: Sound Based. This move can be used many times in the same Round. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every consecutive time you use it. Up to 8 dice may be added this way. Reset the effect if the user performs another move, evasion, or clash.
Description: The user shouts loudly and the echo answers back, it will yell louder every time the echo talks back.

Name: Eruption
Effect: Lethal. Reduce 1 Dice from the Damage Pool for every missing HP the User has. Up to 5 dice may be removed this way.
Description: A fierce burst of lava coming from the user at full force charring whatever comes in contact with it.

Name: Explosion
Effect: After the damage is dealt the User faints. Lethal.
Description: The user focuses on exploding its body, the explosion deals a massive wave of damage. A very dangerous move.

Name: Endure
Effect: Priority 5. Shield Move. For the rest of the Round damaging moves can not reduce the user's HP to less then 1. Status Ailments, Weather Conditions, Recoil, Self inflicted damage can still deal damage.
Description: The user gets prepared to receive a fatal blow. It resists the pain despite being seriously hurt.

Name: Fairy Lock
Effect: Blocks. Last 1 Round.
Description: The user moves as if locking a door. It takes a few moments before everyone realizes that they are not really trapped.

Name: Facade
Effect: If User's got a Status Ailment (Paralysis, Poison, Burn, etc.) Add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage pool.
Description: The Pokemon will make an upfront attack. If the user is suffering, the attack will be stronger.

Name: Fairy Wind
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a wind covered in fairy dust. It causes itching.

Name: Fake Tears
Effect: Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense by 2.
Description: The user stops battling and feigns to be crying, disrupting the foe's mood to battle and making it lower its guard.

Name: Fake Out
Effect: Priority 1. Flinch the foe. This move will only work the First Round the Pokemon is out in battle. From the second round on, it will fail automatically.
Description: While still preparing for battle, the user will suddenly attack the foe.

Name: Feather Dance
Effect: Reduce the foe's Strength by 2.
Description: A beautiful dance that soothes the hearts of those who watch it, reducing their aggressive intentions.

Name: Feint Attack
Effect: Never Fail.
Description: The Pokemon approaches the foe disarmingly then attacks suddenly without giving any time to react.

Name: False Swipe
Effect: The foe can't go below 1 HP when hit by this Move.
Description: The user strikes the foe but lowers the power of the blow at the last second.

Name: Feint
Effect: Priority 2. This Move ignores any Shielding Move.
Description: The Pokemon feints a strike then hits for real even if the foe attempts to protect itself.

Name: Fell Stinger
Effect: If the foe faints due to damage from this attack increase the user's Strength by 2.
Description: The Pokemon stings the target. If the foe is too weakened to move it absorbs part of its power.

Name: Extrasensory
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
Description: The user attacks with an odd, almost invisible power.

Name: Entrainment
Effect: The target's Ability is replaced by the User's own Ability. (ie. Luvdiscs's Swift Swim Ability will replace Geodude's Sturdy Ability).
Description: The Pokemon dances with a catchy rhythm. The target starts dancing too and both connect to a very personal level through this performance.

Name: Fire Blast
Effect: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to apply Burn 3 to the foe. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon shoots a giant fireball that explodes on contact with the foe, blasting fire in all directions.

Name: Fire Fang
Effect: Roll 2 Chance to Flinch the Foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user breathes fire from its mouth while biting the target.

Name: Fiery Dance
Effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Special.
Description: The user cloaks itself in flames and shoots them while dancing gracefully.

Name: Fire Pledge
Effect: All flammable plants and objects in the battlefield are covered in flames. Roll 1 Dice of Fire Damage at the end of every Round against everyone on the field.
Description: The Pokemon chants to invoke the power of Fire. Its pledge is heard, then the flames consume everything around.

Name: Fissure
Effect: Ranged. Deal damage to the Target equal to their remaining HP plus 1 lethal damage. -5 Accuracy.
Description: The user tears the ground apart in a monstrous display of force. If the foe falls through the fissure it might need a rescue team to get it out.

Name: Fire Lash
Effect: Reduce Foe's Defense.
Description: With a whip of fire, the Pokemon ensnares its foe, who is left defenseless and at its mercy.

Name: Final Gambit
Effect: Ignore the foe's Defenses. The user faints after dealing damage.
Description: The Pokemon puts its last strength into an all-or-nothing attack. After that, it faints.

Name: First Impression
Effect: Priority 2. This move will only work the First Round the Pokemon is out in battle. From the second round on it will fail automatically.
Description: The Pokemon makes a dramatic entrance to the battlefield, taking the foe by surprise as to who its opponent really is.

Name: Fire Punch
Effect: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to apply Burn 2 to the foe.
Description: The User can ignite its fists for a brief moment without any danger of getting burned. The foe may not be so lucky.

Name: Fire Spin
Effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user creates a vortex of fire that remains spinning in the battlefield, trapping the foe within.

Name: Fishious Rend
Effect: If the foe has not had its Turn this Round, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: This Pokemon uses its gills to snap at its target, even if they don't have teeth, they can have a crushing strength.

Name: Flame Charge
Effect: Increase the User's Dexterity.
Description: The Pokemon uses its flames as propulsion to strike the foe.

Name: Flame Burst
Effect: After dealing damage, the user may roll 1 Dice of Damage against two other Targets.
Description: A concentrated flameball that bursts on contact with the foe, scattering smaller flames around.

Name: False Surrender
Effect: Never Fail.
Description: The Pokemon bows in defeat, begging for forgiveness, then backstabs its gullible foe.

Name: Flail
Effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every missing HP the user has. Up to +5 Dice may be added this way.
Description: The User flails and struggles to survive. The more weakened it is the stronger this attack will be.

Name: Flamethrower
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the foe.
Description: The user lets out a powerful fire stream that leaves a scorched trail.

Name: Flame Wheel
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.
Description: The user cloaks itself in flames and rolls to tackle the target.

Name: Flash Cannon
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.
Description: The Pokemon absorbs the reflecting light on its body, releasing a powerful beam against the foe.

Name: Flash
Effect: Reduce 1 success from all the foe's Accuracy rolls.
Description: The user suddenly emits a blinding light around its body, dazing its opponent in the process.

Name: Flatter
Effect: Increase the foe's Special. Confuse foe.
Description: The user starts flattering and admiring its opponent. It sure makes it feel good about itself, but why?

Name: Floral Healing
Effect: Basic Heal. If performed over Grassy Terrain this move is a Complete Heal.
Description: The user creates a flower crown that heals and relaxes its wearer. Under the right conditions this move also creates a flower patch around its target.

Name: Floaty Fall
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
Description: With the help of some air balloons, the user jumps up high and falls on top of its foe. The use of balloons in-battle is questionable, but the referee will allow them.

Name: Flying Press
Effect: When Dealing damage with this move, it counts as if this move was also Flying Type.
Description: The user flies towards the foe from the sky in pure Lucha Libre style.

Name: Fleur Cannon
Effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.
Description: A light beam pierces the battlefield, it deals devastating damage but leaves newly grown flowers instead of scorched earth. The user is left feeling very tired.

Name: Focus Energy
Effect: All of the user's damage moves now have High Critical. This effect lasts until end of scene or the user is removed from battle.
Description: The Pokemon's energy is raised to make all strikes much more precise.

Name: Fly
Effect: Charge Move. While charging this move the User will be out of range, with the exception of the attacks Hurricane and Thunder.
Description: The user flies up high in one action, then drops and strikes in the next one. The Pokemon can fly for extremely long periods of time without getting tired.

Name: Focus Punch
Effect: Fist Based. Charge Move. The User will flinch if it gets hit before releasing this attack.
Description: A brutal punch that requires calm and concentration

Name: Follow Me
Effect: Foes will target the user this Round. Priority 5.
Description: The Pokemon will draw everyone's attention. All foes are taunted to do their worst.

Name: Foresight
Effect: The Foe cannot evade moves performed by the user. User's Normal and Fighting Moves can affect Ghost Types and Ghost Moves can affect Normal Types.
Description: The Pokemon uses its developed senses and mental ability to foresee the immediate future.

Name: Forest's Curse
Effect: Add the Grass Type to the Target's Type (ie. Nidoran will now be Poison/Grass Heracross will now be Bug/Fight/Grass). If the Pokemon already has a third type attached then replace it.
Description: The user calls the forest to lay a curse upon the target, making it grow vines and vegetation around its whole body. The curse will not be easily lifted without a medium's help.

Name: Focus Blast
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user concentrates and releases a blast of energy.

Name: Flare Blitz
Effect: Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the foe.
Description: The user sets itself on fire, recklessly charging against the target with a brutal strike.

Name: Foul Play
Effect: S.T.A.B of the user and Strength of the foe apply for this move's damage.
Description: The user feint attacks then tricks the foe who ends up hurting itself.

Name: Force Palm
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
Description: A powerful open palm hit that knocks the foe away and may leave him unable to move.

Name: Freeze Shock
Effect: Lethal. Ranged. Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user appears to become a block of ice, then it releases itself from the ice with a devastating discharge. The exploding ice shards and the lightning fly all over the battlefield.

Name: Freezy Frost
Effect: If successful, remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits the Foe may have. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user touches its foe while playing "Freeze!". Surprisingly, the foe becomes frozen on a block of ice. Once they realize they were just playing pretend the ice dissolves into haze.

Name: Flower Shield
Effect: Increase the Defense of All Grass Type Pokemon on the field.
Description: The Pokemon uses a mysterious power that causes flowers to bloom beneath every Grass Pokemon nearby. Flora in this field is more resilient and beautiful.

Name: Freeze Dry
Effect: Water type Pokemon are dealt 2 Extra Damage.
Description: The user freezes all moisture in the environment, water type Pokemon suffer greatly.

Name: Frost Breath
Effect: This Move is always a Critical Hit and it gets the proper bonus for it. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user shoots a gelid breath against the target that sends a chill through the spine. The sudden change of temperature can bring anyone to its knees.

Name: Frenzy Plant
Effect: Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user roots down and calls the plants to grow in a frenzy around the foe, though it leaves the user exhausted.

Name: Fling
Effect: Ranged. Add up to 4 Dice to the Damage Pool, depending on the held item thrown. See P. 432 for more info.
Description: The usr takes its held item and throws it at the opponent. You may get it back after the fight.

Name: Frustration
Effect: Add +1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every missing point of Happiness on the User.
Description: A move that relies on how badly a Pokemon has been treated to make it vicious and uncaring.

Name: Fury Attack
Effect: Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon goes at it with everything its got in a rather disordered way.

Name: Future Sight
Effect: Strikes at the end of the next Round. It bypasses any Shield Move and cover. If the target retires or switches out from battle the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies.
Description: The Pokemon foresses something terrible happening to the target. It may see images from its own future without any risk.

Name: Fusion Flare
Effect: Lethal. If the Move “Fusion Bolt” has already been used by anyone this Round, add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move
Description: The Pokemon sets ablaze a swirling pillar upon the target, said pillar will grow taller and swirl faster if there's a special kind of charge nearby.

Name: Fury Cutter
Effect: Successive Actions.
Description: The Pokemon makes use of its claws or scythes to land as many hits as possible.

Name: Fury Swipes
Effect: Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user swiftly uses its claws to strike the foe multiple times.

Name: Gear Grind
Effect: Double Action. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user traps the foe between its gears and crushes it with two painful grinds.

Name: Fusion Bolt
Effect: Lethal. If the Move “Fusion Flare” has already been used by anyone this Round, add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move.
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a devastating electric impact, said impact will grow larger and stronger if there's a special kind of fire nearby.

Name: Gastro Acid
Effect: Until the end of the Scene, eliminate any effect the foe's Ability would do.
Description: The user spits some of its own gastric juices, the acid prevents the foe from using its special abilities.

Name: Giga Drain
Effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
Description: The Pokemon extracts a great amount of vital energy from the foe's body.

Name: Geomancy
Effect: Charge Move. The user charges, then Increases by 2 its Dexterity, Special and Sp. Defense scores on its next Turn.
Description: Through a mystical connection this Pokemon absorbs the life force of earth itself to increase its power.

Name: Giga Impact
Effect: Must Recharge. Lethal. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a brutal force using all its body. The impact leaves the user somewhat stunned.

Name: Gear Up
Effect: Increase the Strength and Special of one Steel-Type or Electric-Type Ally.
Description: The user engages its gears on an ally to leave the ally's body working like a welloiled machine.

Name: Glare
Effect: Paralyze the foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon uses its intimidating glare to paralyze the foe with sheer terror.

Name: Glitzy Glow
Effect: If successful, for the next 4 Rounds the User and Allies will receive 1 less damage from Special Attacks. This effect does not stack. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
Description: The user surrounds itself with a glamorous light, releasing it as a psychic blast, the soft glowing particles remain in the field protecting its fabulousness.

Name: Grav Apple
Effect: Ranged. Reduce the Foe's Defense.
Description: The Pokemon rises on top of its foe and drops an apple on their head. The foe proceeds to eat the apple, distracting it from the fight.

Name: Grapple
Effect: The foe is Blocked. Foe can resist this Maneuver by rolling their Strength or Dexterity score and scoring the same or more successes than the user.

Name: Grassy Terrain
Effect: If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. Everyone in the user's side of the field heals 1 HP at the end of each round. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Rolls of Grass Type Moves.
Description: The Pokemon calls upon the healing power of nature to grow a patch of miraculous grass on its side of the battlefield.

Name: Gravity
Effect: Flying and Levitating Pokemon can be hit by Ground Type Moves. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The gravity is intensified, bringing everyone to their knees. Flying pokemon are slammed to the ground.

Name: Grass Knot
Effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe, up to +4 Extra Dice.
Description: The user snares the target's feet with grass, making it fall to the ground. The bigger the foe the harder the fall.

Name: Growth
Effect: Increase the User's Strength and Special.
Description: The Pokemon expands its body. It grows bigger and stronger.

Name: Glaciate
Effect: Lethal. All Foes in Range. Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.
Description: The air is so cold it hurts to move, to see, to breath. Escaping should be your top priority, for every second you don't your life will be at peril.

Name: Growl (Tough)
Effect: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. Same move as "Growl (Cute)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)
Description: The user exhibits a menacing attitude, making the foe unsure about attacking the user with full force.

Name: Growl
Effect: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. "Growl (Cute/Tough)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)
Description: Either by a menacing attitude or cute demeanor, the foe will be unsure about attacking the user with full force.

Name: Guard Swap
Effect: Switch your Defense and Sp. Defense with your foe.
Description: The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like its got your fraily and make the user ffeel like it got the target's resilience.

Name: Grudge
Effect: The User Faints. The foe gets its Will depleted and any effects gained from spending them. The Foe must roll Loyalty at the end of every Round to keep battling. Each Round 1 more success is required.
Description: The user leaves an imprinting grudge over the foe, this makes the target unwilling to fight. It may only keep battling if something greater is at risk.

Name: Guillotine
Effect: The target is dealt damage equal to its remaining HP plus 1 Lethal. -5 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon uses the sharpest part of its body to almost snap the neck of its foe. It is a devastating attack. The foe must be lucky to get out of it alive.

Name: Grass Whistle
Effect: Sound Based. Put the Target to Sleep. -3 Accuracy.
Description: The user plays a beautiful and soothing melody that lulls the target into a peaceful sleep.

Name: Guard Split
Effect: Average your Defense and Sp. Defense with your target.
Description: The user employs its psychic power to average its resilience with the foe. They both feel like they're equals in terms of toughness.

Name: Gyro Ball
Effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage pool for every point of Dexterity the Foe has that surpasses the user's. Up to 5 Dice may be added this way.
Description: The user curls up in a ball and spins against the target at a high speed.

Name: Hail
Effect: Hail Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
Description: The user summons a hailstorm that will stay on the battlefield for some time.

Name: Growl (Cute)
Effect: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. Same move as "Growl (Tough)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)
Description: The user shows its cute demeanor, making the foe unsure about attacking the user with full force.

Name: Gunk Shot
Effect: Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon shoots a stream of corrosive sludge made with the most toxic substances it can produce. Just inhaling the scent can make you feel very sick.

Name: Haze
Effect: Remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits on everyone on the Battlefield.
Description: The user sends out a haze that disturbs all the Pokemon engaged in battle. It may conceal whoever is inside.

Name: Gust
Description: The Pokemon flaps its wings to strike the foe with wind.

Name: Hammer Arm
Effect: After dealing damage, Reduce user's Dexterity. -1 Accuracy.
Description: A mighty arm thrust that leaves the user quite tired.

Name: Harden
Effect: Increase the User's Defense.
Description: The user stiffins its body and prepares for any incoming attack.

Name: Head Smash
Effect: Recoil. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user charges head first to attack the foe, the strike is devastating for both.

Name: Grass Pledge
Effect: Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.
Description: The Pokemon chants to invoke the power of Grass. Its pledge is heard then then soil trembles and the ground crumbles as vegetation rises to grapple anyone in the field.

Name: Headbutt
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch. May call Random Encounters when hitting trees.
Description: The user strikes the foe with its hard head. Perfect for taking down fruits from trees or shake Pokemon out of their nests on treetops.

Name: Heal Bell
Effect: Cure the User and allies suffering from Status Conditions. They don't need to be on the battlefield to get this effect. Sound Based.
Description: The Pokemon chimes a magical bell. Legend says the soothing sound has healing properties.

Name: Heal Order
Effect: Basic Heal.
Description: The Pokemon commands its swarm to bring some healing honey.

Name: Heal Block
Effect: No one can regain any lost HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The user forces everyone's wounds to stay open by using its immense psychic power.

Name: Head Charge
Effect: Recoil.
Description: The Pokemon clashes against the foe using its head aas a boulder.

Name: Heart Stamp
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
Description: This move controls the emotions of the target, making it feel loved and safe. The user may strike immediately.

Name: Heal Pulse
Effect: Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will to activate.
Description: The user emits a pulse of energy that heals the wounds of its allies.

Name: Heart Swap
Effect: Switch any Trait Increase/Decrease with the target.
Description: The user and the target swap their feelings of powerr and weakness, insecurity and courage, love and hate. Boosts are also swapped.

Name: Help Another
Effect: Roll your Accuracy as if it was Chance Dice. If Successful, add one die to the Action of an Ally. Up to 6 dice may be added this way.

Name: Hidden Power
Effect: Storyteller decides power and type
Description: Every Pokemon has an unknown power that can be released with surprising results.

Name: Hone Claws
Effect: Increase the User's Strength and Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon sharpens its claws to perform more precise attacks.

Name: Healing Wish
Effect: The User faints. One Ally is completely healed from all damage and status ailments.
Description: The power of ultimate love and sacrifice. The user wishes to completely heal all injuries, diseases, and ailments to save someone's life at the cost of their own health.

Name: Helping Hand
Effect: Target Pokemon gets 2 Extra Dice on its next Skill, Accuracy and Damage Rolls. Priority 5.
Description: The Pokemon assists an ally. Together they are stronger.

Name: High Jump Kick
Effect: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 5 Dice of Damage to the User. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user launches itself up and falls down with a brutal kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.

Name: High Horsepower
Description: The Pokemon rushes towards its target and tramples it without mercy.

Name: Heat Crash
Effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight above the target's weight. Up to +4 Extra Dice may be added this way.
Description: The user slams the target with a body engulfed in fire.

Name: Hex
Effect: If the Target is affected by a Status Ailment add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
Description: The user casts a terrible hex over the target, the effects will be greater if the target is vulnerable.

Name: Heavy Slam
Effect: Add 1 Extra Dice for every 50 kgs. of weight above the target's weight, up to +4 Extra Dice.
Description: The user slams the foe usin its whole body weight. Smaller foes will be deeply affected.

Name: Heat Wave
Effect: Target all foes in Range. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn those affected. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user breathes a giant wave of incandescent air that might set fire to whatever it touches.

Name: Horn Attack
Description: The Pokemon attacks the foe with its horns. This strike is very painful.

Name: Horn Drill
Effect: The target is dealt damage equal to its remaining HP plus 1 Lethal. -5 Accuracy.
Description: The user stabs the target with a horn used like a drill. The foe is often left in a critical condition. A move to be wary of.

Name: Howl
Effect: Increase the User's Strength.
Description: The Pokemon lets out an impressive howl, making it appear a lot more menacing.

Name: Horn Leech
Effect: The User restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
Description: The user rams the foe and absorbs some of its vital energy with its horns.

Name: Hydro Cannon
Effect: Must Recharge. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon blasts the foe with a water surge that could bring down a house. The user needs to res afterwards.

Name: Hurricane
Effect: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the Foe. If Rain Weather in effect ignore this moves reduced accuracy. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The user attacks by wrapping the opponent in a fierce wind that carries the target up into the sky.

Name: Hyper Beam
Effect: Must Recharge. Lethal. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon casts an incredible beam that leaves a giant trail of destruction behind. The user is left exhausted.

Name: Hyper Voice
Effect: Sound Based.
Description: The user emits a horrible echoing sound that could burst the ears.

Name: Hyper Fang
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch.
Description: The Pokemon bites hard into the foe with its powerful fangs.

Name: Hyperspace Fury
Effect: Never Fail. Ignores the effect of any Shield Move the Foe might have used. Reduce the user's Defense.
Description: The Pokemon opens portals to attack with each one of its arms, bypassing all defenses and making it impossible to escape, however, the user's defense also gets neglected.

Name: Hyperspace Hole
Effect: Ignore Defenses. Never Miss. This Move Bypasses the effects of any Shield Move effect on the foe.
Description: The user knows the laws of physics bind it from being in many places at once and forbid it from occupying the same space as other bodies. It just disregards their authority.

Name: Hypnosis
Effect: Put the target to sleep. Dark-Type Pokemon are affected by this move. -4 Accuracy.
Description: Employ a hypnotic suggestion to make the target feel drowsy and fall into a deep slumber. Works better on a target that is not in danger.

Name: Ice Beam
Effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze the Foe.
Description: The user shoots a freezing ray that greatly lowers the temperature of anything it hits.

Name: Ice Fang
Effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user bites the foe and releases a gelid breath through its mouth.

Name: Ice Shard
Effect: Ranged. Priority 1.
Description: The user quickly freezes some bits of ice and throws them at the target.

Name: Ice Hammer
Effect: Reduce User's Dexterity. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon uses its powerful gelid arms and strikes the foe with a swinging motion.

Name: Icicle Crash
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user drops a big icicle over the foe, the impact may leave the opponent dazed.

Name: Icy Wind
Effect: Reduce Dexterity of those affected.
Description: A breeze so cold that it chills you to the bone, making it harder to move.

Name: Imprison
Effect: The foe cannot use any Moves known by the User. Lasts for a day.
Description: This move blocks specific parts of the memory the user is well aware of. Be it moves, techniques, names, places, people, or situations. The target won't be able to recall those memories.

Name: Icicle Spear
Effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.
Description: The user launches a wave of small but pointy icicles towards the target.

Name: Ice Punch
Effect: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze the foe.
Description: The Pokemon delivers a strike covered in ice. The user's hands can freeze anything they touch.

Name: Incinerate
Effect: Destroy the held Berries of those affected.
Description: The Pokemon releases a blast of fire that instantly consumes small flammable objects.

Name: Infestation
Effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The Pokemon summons a huge swarm of bugs to prevent the foe from escaping. Sometimes the swarm may take a hit to the foe. The call extends for hundreds of yards.

Name: Ice Ball
Effect: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of the last Ice Ball hit the user performes. If the Pokemon used Defense Curl this Round, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of every hit. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user curls into a snowball, rolling against the foe. The ball grows bigger as it rolls.

Name: Inferno
Effect: Lethal. Apply Burn 3 to the Foe. -3 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon sets the foe on fire. These flames rise up to 6 feet. A very dangerous Move.

Name: Hydro Pump
Effect: -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user builds up pressure inside its body and then releases a tremendous amount of water at the target.

Name: Ion Deluge
Effect: For the rest of the Scene, Normal Type Moves will deal damage as if they were Electric Type Moves.
Description: The user amplifies all electrically charged particles in the environment. The results are shocking!

Name: Instruct
Effect: Selected Target repeats their last move used this Round, taking the successes on the Accuracy Roll of "Instruct" as if they were for their move. Target must have previously used a successful move during the Round. Otherwise "Instruct" will fail.
Description: The Pokemon sends a psychic command to one of its allies or foes to enable them to repeat their last action.

Name: Iron Head
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
Description: The Pokemon charges at the foe with a brutal headbutt that may leave the target knocked down on the ground.

Name: Ice Burn
Effect: Lethal. Ranged. Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn the Foe. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user appears to become a block of ice, then it releases itself from the ice with a devastating explosion. The exploding ice shards and fire blow all over the battlefield.

Name: Iron Tail
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Defense. -3 Accuracy.
Description: The user hits the foe with its hardened tail. The target is left vulnerable against subsequent attacks.

Name: Jaw Lock
Effect: Both User and Target are Blocked.
Description: The user will capture its foe in a crushing jaw grip. It won't let go no matter how much you try to seperate them. The only way it will release its victim is by fainting.

Name: Ingrain
Effect: User Heals 1 HP at the end of every Round. While this move is active the User is now Blocked.
Description: The Pokemon roots itself to the ground, absorbing the nutrients and recovering health.

Name: Iron Defense
Effect: Increase the User's Defense by 2.
Description: The Pokemon hardens its body surface as if it was made from the strongest iron around.

Name: Judgment
Effect: Ignore Defenses. This Move is considered to be any Type the user wants. If something would prevent this Move from dealing Damage, ignore it. This Move can't be Clashed. This Move's Power and extra Added Effects are decided by the Storyteller.
Description: Eventually, everyone gets what they deserve.

Name: Jump Kick
Effect: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 4 Dice of Damage to the User.
Description: The Pokemon jumps and delivers a powerful kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.

Name: Kinesis
Effect: Lower the foe's Accuracy.
Description: A basic psychic power to exert force on objects. You can touch, move, press, and affect simple objects to create distractions.

Name: Karate Chop
Effect: High Critical.
Description: A basic fighting chop that has been practiced and mastered.

Name: Last Resort
Effect: It can be used only after the Pokemon has performed all its known moves at least once during the battle.
Description: When everything else fails, the Pokemon gives everything in a last resort attack.

Name: Land's Wrath
Effect: Lethal. Ranged. All Foes in Range.
Description: The earth moves on its own, no attacker in sight. The floor crumbles and the ground shakes while engulfing its victims. From the rubble, lush trees emerge a short time after.

Name: King's Shield
Effect: Priority 3. Shield. If the foe was using a Physical Move. Reduce the foe's Strength by 2. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokemon uses a ghostly shield to protect itself. If the foe managed to touch it, the user will drain some of its lifeforce.

Name: Leaf Storm
Effect: Reduce the User's Special by 2. -1 Accuracy.
Description: A furious storm of sharp leaves swirls and pierces the target. The user is left exhausted.

Name: Leaf Blade
Effect: Lethal. High Critical.
Description: The Pokemon uses the sharp leaves on its body to cut through the foe.

Name: Lava Plume
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn those affected.
Description: The user shoots up bits of molten lava that fall scattered around the field.

Name: Leaf Tornado
Effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Accuracy. -1 Accuracy.
Description: A bush worth of sharp leaves swirls around the foe making it harder for it to aim attacks properly.

Name: Laser Focus
Effect: The next time the user lands a hit it will be treated as if it were a Critical Hit.
Description: Through its incredible awareness the Pokemon finds a straight path into a weak point of the foe. The attack that follows is usually devastating.

Name: Leafage
Effect: Ranged.
Description: The user throws leaf darts towards its foe.

Name: Leech Life
Effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt rounded down.
Description: The user attacks a vital spot and sucks away the vitality of its foe.

Name: Leech Seed
Effect: If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, Roll 1 Dice of Damage to the foe. User heals for 1 HP for every damage dealt this way. Grass Type Pokemon are immune to this Move. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.

Name: Lick
Effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.
Description: The user licks the foe. The saliva can numb the body of most creatures.

Name: Life Dew
Effect: If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. User and Allies in Range heal 1 HP at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The user creates a fresh-water dew that makes it and its allies full of energy.

Name: Light Of Ruin
Effect: Lethal. Recoil. -1 Accuracy.
Description: By drawing energy from the Eternal Flower, the Pokemon unleashes all of its hurt. A beautiful light surrounds the area, yet the pain inside of its heart remains.

Name: Light Screen
Effect: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Special Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating walls and floors of light that help prevent the passing of energies.

Name: Lock-On
Effect: The next attack the user performs has 2 automatic unremovable successes on its Accuracy Roll.
Description: The Pokemon's eyes zoom at a moving target to ensure that the next attack will be dealt with precision.

Name: Low Kick
Effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe. Up to +4 Extra Dice may be added this way.
Description: The user kicks the target making it fall, the bigger the foe the harder the fall.

Name: Knock Off
Effect: The target Pokemon loses its held item.
Description: The Pokemon makes a quick tackle that knocks off anything the foe was holding.

Name: Leer
Effect: Reduce the Defense of those affected.
Description: A vicious glare that will make any opponent doubt its own strength in battle.

Name: Lunar Dance
Effect: The user Faints. One fallen Ally regains consciousness, has its HP fully restored and all Status Ailments healed. If the Ally was not in-battle, it is called out and ready to fight.
Description: The moon shines at the darkest hours, reflecting the sun's lifebringer light on those who fell into the night, taking pity on their lost souls.

Name: Low Sweep
Effect: Reduce Foe's Dexterity by 2.
Description: The Pokemon strikes the foe's legs, leaving it unable to walk normally or run.

Name: Liquidation
Effect: Lethal. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.
Description: The Pokemon gets close to its foe then strikes while bursting a full-force blast of pressurized water, the water may cut or dent through the foe's armor.

Name: Lucky Chant
Effect: User and Allies in range can re-roll one un-successful die from all their rolls until the end of the scene. If an opponent would land a Critical Hit it doesn't. Outside of battle good things happen at the story tellers discretion.
Description: The user chants an incantation to the skies. The beautiful performance grants this Pokemon and its allies divine protection.

Name: Luster Purge
Effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense. This Effect can be repeated up to 3 times per Target.
Description: The user engulfs itself in a blinding light and shoots a beam at its foe. This light leaves the foe powerless to resist against anyone.

Name: Mach Punch
Effect: Fist Based. Priority 1.
Description: The user launches a punch so quickly that it's barely seen.

Name: Magic Coat
Effect: Priority 4. Redirect the effects of a Support Move that would affect the user or its side of the battlefield towards the foe's (ie. The foe used Stealth Rock, with Magic Coat it will now affect the foe's side instead of yours).
Description: The user quickly creates a barrier that reflects any minor attack, status condition, or dirty triick the foe might have wanted to use.

Name: Magical Leaf
Effect: Never Fail.
Description: The user sends out a floating leaf that will pursue the target until it hits.

Name: Magic Powder
Effect: Change the target's Type to Psychic.
Description: The Pokemon recites an enchantment and blows a cloud of pink dust on its Target. Afterwards, the target becomes especially good at guessing which card you got from a deck.

Name: Magic Room
Effect: No one can use their Held Item nor any other Item. Lasts 4 Rounds.
Description: Inside the effects of Magic Room, technology, tools, and items manually activated do not work. Automated technology will function as normal.

Name: Magnet Bomb
Effect: Ranged. Never Fail.
Description: The Pokemon hurls a metal bomb that is attracted to the target like a magnet. The moment it touches the foe, it will explode.

Name: Magnet Rise
Effect: For the Next 4 Rounds the User gains immunity against Ground Type Moves.
Description: The Pokemon uses the magnetic field of the earth to repel itself from the ground, allowing it to float for a short period of time.

Name: Mat Block
Effect: Shield. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. This Move only works the first Round the User has been out.
Description: The Pokemon uses a mat or something similar as a shield.

Name: Magma Storm
Effect: Blocks. Roll 3 Damage Dice at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -2 Accuracy.
Description: The Pokemon shoots a fiery eruption to its foe. Unable to escape and surrounded by the unbearable heat the foe's survival is at risk.

Name: Magnitude
Effect: Ranged. 1 Dice to determine this Move's Power
Description: The user quakes the ground plates. Some plates will move easier than others.

Name: Lovely Kiss
Effect: Put the Target to Sleep.
Description: The Pokemon approaches the foe with a kiss. Its ugly face and awful smooch make the poor creature faint in terror.

Name: Me First
Effect: Priority 1. The User copies and uses the Move the target was intending to use. It must be a damaging Move.
Description: The user anticipates the next attack so it can hit the target with an astounding speed.

Name: Magnetic Flux
Effect: Increase the Defense and Sp. Defense of User and all its Electric and Steel Type Allies.
Description: The Pokemon bends the magnetic field around itself, this also affects all allies who are sensible to it.

Name: Mean Look
Effect: Blocks.
Description: The Pokemon gives a menacing look that freezes the foe on the spot with intense fear.

Name: Meditate
Effect: Increase the User's Strength
Description: The Pokemon meditates to unleash a power that's been sleeping deep inside the user.

Name: Lunge
Effect: Reduce foe's Strength.
